chart.description: Number of times the Consul server starts a leader election
chart.name: Raft candidate state

chart.description: This is a general indicator of the write load on the Consul servers.
chart.name: Number of Raft Transactions

chart.name: Time to service DNS queries

chart.description: Number of nodes in Consul cluster
chart.name: Total Nodes

chart.description: General load pressure indicator for Consul agent
chart.name: Number of GO routines running

chart.name: Serf Events

chart.name: Node health check results

chart.name: Leader last contact with followers

chart.description: Indicates memory pressure on a Consul agent
chart.name: Number of allocated heap objects

chart.name: Number of Events in Queue

chart.name: Allocated bytes

chart.description: Time it takes to commit an entry on the leader
chart.name: Raft commit time

chart.description: Recognize server state (leader/follower)
chart.name: Consul Server Map

chart.description: Number of services registered with a given node
chart.name: # Services by Node

chart.description: This measures the time it takes the leader to replicate log entries to followers. This is a general indicator of the load pressure on the Consul servers, as well as the performance of the communication between the servers.
chart.name: Leader Time to Append Entries

options.markdown:
`consul.raft.state.leader` metric  increments whenever a Consul server becomes a leader.  
If there are frequent leadership changes this may be an indication that the servers are overloaded and aren't meeting the soft real-time requirements for Raft, or that there are networking problems between the servers.

chart.name: Network latency
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.consul.network.node.latency.avg', filter=filter('consul_mode', 'server')).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.consul.network.node.latency.max', filter=filter('consul_mode', 'server')).publish(label='B')
C = data('gauge.consul.network.node.latency.min', filter=filter('consul_mode', 'server')).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Network latency
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.consul.network.node.latency.avg', filter=filter('consul_mode', 'client')).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.consul.network.node.latency.max', filter=filter('consul_mode', 'client')).publish(label='B')
C = data('gauge.consul.network.node.latency.min', filter=filter('consul_mode', 'client')).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Time taken to service forward and reverse DNS lookups in milliseconds
chart.name: Time to service DNS queries

chart.description: Recognize server state (leader/follower)
chart.name: Consul Server Map

chart.description: Time it takes for the leader to reconcile Serf membership and what is reflected in Consul's store
chart.name: Leader Time to Reconcile

chart.description: Number of Raft peers in cluster
chart.name: Total Consul Peers

chart.description: Indicates memory pressure on a Consul agent
chart.name: Number of allocated heap objects

options.markdown:
`consul.raft.state.candidate` metric increments whenever a Consul server starts an election.  
If this increments without a leadership change occurring it could indicate that a single server is overloaded or is experiencing network connectivity issues.

chart.description: Number of services by health check state
chart.name: Service health check results

chart.description: A general measure of all read volume
chart.name: Number of RPC queries

chart.description: Time it takes for the leader to write log entries to disk
chart.name: Leader latency to commit to disk

chart.description: # allocated bytes to the Consul process
chart.name: Allocated Bytes
